entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Sanirajak
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:16 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Haze, -41.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sanirajak (Hall Beach Airport) 12:06 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
Condition: Haze
Temperature: -41.0°C
Pressure: 100.8 kPa
Visibility: 2.4 km
Humidity: 62 %
Wind Chill: -58
Dewpoint: -45.4°C
Wind: N 22 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 45.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h early this evening. Low minus 45. Wind chill minus 51 this evening and minus 62 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 38.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 30 km/h. High minus 38. Wind chill minus 61 in the morning and minus 56 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Temperature steady near minus 37.
